name: Corrosive Gas
description: You surround yourself and everything within a 20-foot radius of you in highly acidic gas. The gas lasts for the duration or until strong wind (such as the one created by Gust) disperses it. Its area is Heavily Obscured.

All Held Berries in the area instantly melt away. Each non-poison-type creature that starts its turn in the sphere must succeed on a CON saving throw against your Move DC. On failure, until the end of the current turn, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks; additionally, if the creature's SR is below 15, then it cannot benefit from Held Items.
